org.jerkar.plugins.jacoco

Class JkBuildPluginJacoco

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkBuildPlugin
      • org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild.JkJavaBuildPlugin
        • org.jerkar.plugins.jacoco.JkBuildPluginJacoco

  • public class JkBuildPluginJacoco
extends JkJavaBuildPlugin
    Alter the unitTester to be launched with the Jacoco agent. It results in producing a jacoco.exec test coverage report file.
